segments.description: forgot password - check to see if token is valid

segments.name: authenticate/forgot
segments.description: forgot password - make a new request

segments.name: account/campaign/backer
segments.description: retrieve specific or all campaign backers

segments.name: account/campaign/raise_mode
segments.description: get a specific allowed raise mode or list of all allowed raise modes if Raise Mode ID is not supplied

segments.name: account/campaign
segments.description: get a specific campaign or list of all campaigns if campaign ID is not supplied
segments.filters: category, location, name, entry_status_id, featured, description, backer, manager, hidden

segments.name: account/campaign/status
segments.description: get a specific campaign status or list of all campaign statuses if Campaign Status ID is not supplied

segments.name: account/campaign/stripe_account
segments.description: get a list of all campaign stripe accounts for currently logged in user

segments.name: account/campaign/faq_pair
segments.description: create campaign faq pair, pairs is an array containing question, answer and display_priority

segments.name: account/campaign/shipping_option
segments.call_syntax: campaign/<Campaign ID>/pledge-level/<Pledge Level ID>/shipping-option/<Shipping Option ID>

segments.name: account/campaign/shipping_option
segments.call_syntax: campaign/<Campaign ID>/pledge-level/<Pledge Level ID>/shipping-option/[<Shipping Option ID>]

segments.name: account/campaign/shipping_option
segments.call_syntax: campaign/<Campaign ID>/pledge-level/<Pledge Level ID>/shipping-option/<Shipping Option ID>

segments.name: account/campaign/pledge_transaction
segments.description: attempt to re-try the failed pledge pre-auth transaction

segments.name: account/campaign/stream_notify
segments.description: notify stream subscribers via email that update has been published

segments.name: account/campaign/video_check
segments.description: check provided video link and return result, takes Base64 encoded URL

segments.name: account/profile/confirm
segments.description: check to see if provided email change request token is valid

segments.name: account/profile/person
segments.description: retrieve public profile of a person

segments.name: account/profile/email
segments.description: retrieves user account information via provided email address ( portal_admin only )

segments.name: account/profile/email
segments.description: request email address update for currently logged in user

segments.name: account/profile/resource
segments.extra_params: business_organization_id ( if passed, resource belonging to organization will be deleted instead )

segments.name: account/profile/resource
segments.extra_params: business_organization_id ( returned in descending file.created order ), person_id ( only available for portal admin )

segments.name: account/profile/resource
segments.extra_params: business_organization_id ( if supplied business organization resource is updated instead )

segments.name: account/profile/website
segments.extra_params: person_id ( only available for portal admin )

segments.name: account/profile/stripe/connect
segments.description: retrieve stripe application connections for currently logged in user

segments.name: account/profile/stripe/currency
segments.description: retrieve stripe currency information (list of currencies for stripe application account country)

segments.name: account/profile/stripe/country
segments.description: retrieve stripe country information (list of countries where stripe is available)

segments.name: account/profile/stripe/account_card
segments.call_syntax: account/stripe/<Stripe Account ID>/card/<Stripe Account Card ID>

segments.call_syntax: account/stripe/<Stripe Account ID>/card/[<Stripe Account Card ID>]
segments.description: retrieve specific stripe account card or all cards

segments.name: account/profile/stripe/account_card
segments.call_syntax: account/stripe/<Stripe Account ID>/card/<Stripe Account Card ID>

segments.name: account/profile/stripe
segments.description: create stripe pledger account and default card data

segments.name: account/profile/stripe/guest
segments.description: create stripe guest pledger account and default card data

segments.name: account/profile/stripe
segments.description: delete stripe pledger account and card data

segments.description: retrieve stripe pledger account and card data ( specific account or all attached accounts )
